query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.nome,
  p.ativo,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = p.id) as clientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = p.id) as concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE projectId = p.id) as leads,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos WHERE projectId = p.id) as mercados
FROM projects p
ORDER BY p.id
